mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID,PARENT_ID,NAME,URL,PERMS,TYPE,ICON,ORDER_NUM,SHOWS FROM SYS_MENU WHERE TYPE != 2 AND SHOWS = 1 ORDER BY ORDER_NUM ASC
SELECT A.*,B.NAME PARENT_NAME FROM SYS_MENU A LEFT JOIN SYS_MENU B ON A.PARENT_ID = B.MENU_ID AND A.SHOWS = 1 AND B.SHOWS = 1 ORDER BY A.MENU_ID,A.ORDER_NUM
SELECT MAX(MENU_ID) FROM SYS_MENU WHERE SHOWS = 1 AND PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
